text: When I got my new ham a couple weeks ago I was surprised and impressed by the thick cardboard box Petsmart provided. Way different from the flimsy boxes of my youth... guess not all places are doing that! Glad for it tho as my guy would definitely have chewed out also.

That dad will be dying by the time they're through. Nothing in the world kids like more than being hurled. And with their dog no less! He will  *never want it to end*.

Seriously very precious tho, the son's uncontrollable laughter is everything.
